description: This dataset details communities in the MWRD coverage area which are and are not enrolled in the FEMA Community Rating System. The data came from  MWRD study detailing the Economic Development Impact of the Watershed Management Ordinance from June 2012.

metadata.attribution: South Suburban Mayors and Managers Association

name: SSMMA CRS
